alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Logan; Mercer; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN LOGAN, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, CENTRAL AUGLAIZE, SOUTHEASTERN MERCER AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Newport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wapakoneta, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Newport, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Russells Point, Botkins, Lakeview, New Knoxville, Hardin, Moulton, Russia, Port Jefferson, Osgood, Buckland and Kettlersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Auglaize; Darke; Logan; Mercer; Miami; Shelby
